class.name: com.aghajari.rvplugins.Amir_RVAnimation
class.comment:
Amir RecyclerView Plugin
Make Animations For Set To RecyclerView Layout

method.name: RepeatCount
method.comment: Sets how many times the animation should be repeated. If the repeat count is 0, the animation is never repeated. If the repeat count is greater than 0 or INFINITE, the repeat mode will be taken into account. The repeat count is 0 by default.

method.name: StartOffset
method.comment: When this animation should start relative to the start time. This is most useful when composing complex animations using an AnimationSet where some of the animations components start at different times.

method.name: FillBefore
method.comment: If fillBefore is true, this animation will apply its transformation before the start time of the animation. Defaults to true if not set. Note that this applies when using an {@link android.view.animation.AnimationSet AnimationSet} to chain animations. The transformation is not applied before the AnimationSet itself starts.

method.name: StartTime
method.comment: When this animation should start. When the start time is set to START_ON_FIRST_FRAME startTimeMillis: the start time in milliseconds

method.name: DetachWallpape
method.comment: If detachWallpaper is true, and this is a window animation of a window that has a wallpaper background, then the window will be detached from the wallpaper while it runs. That is, the animation will only be applied to the window, and the wallpaper behind it will remain static.

method.name: Duration
method.comment: How long this animation should last. The duration cannot be negative.

method.name: RestrictDuration
method.comment: Ensure that the duration that this animation will run is not longer than <var>durationMillis</var>. In addition to adjusting the duration itself, this ensures that the repeat count also will not make it run longer than the given time.

method.name: FillEnabled
method.comment: If fillEnabled is true, the animation will apply the value of fillBefore and fillAfter. Otherwise, fillBefore and fillAfter are ignored and the animation transformation is always applied.

method.name: RepeatMode
method.comment: Defines what this animation should do when it reaches the end. This setting is applied only when the repeat count is either greater than 0 or INFINITE. Defaults to RESTART.

method.name: ZAdjustment
method.comment: Set the Z ordering mode to use while running the animation. zAdjustment: The desired mode, one of ZORDER_NORMAL, ZORDER_TOP, or ZORDER_BOTTOM.

method.name: Interpolator
method.comment: Sets the interpolator used to interpolate the delays between the children.

method.name: FillAfter
method.comment: If fillAfter is true, the transformation that this animation performed will persist when it is finished. Defaults to false if not set. Note that this applies when using an {@link android.view.animation.AnimationSet AnimationSet} to chain animations. The transformation is not applied before the AnimationSet itself starts.

field.name: ABSOLUTE
field.comment: The specified dimension is an absolute number of pixels.

field.name: ZORDER_NORMAL
field.comment: Requests that the content being animated be kept in its current Z order.

field.name: RELATIVE_TO_PARENT
field.comment: The specified dimension holds a float and should be multiplied by the height or width of the parent of the object being animated.

field.name: RESTART
field.comment: When the animation reaches the end and the repeat count is INFINTE_REPEAT or a positive value, the animation restarts from the beginning.

field.name: REVERSE
field.comment: When the animation reaches the end and the repeat count is INFINTE_REPEAT or a positive value, the animation plays backward (and then forward again).

field.name: INFINITE
field.comment: Repeat the animation indefinitely.

field.name: ZORDER_TOP
field.comment: Requests that the content being animated be forced on top of all other content for the duration of the animation.

field.name: START_ON_FIRST_FRAME
field.comment: Can be used as the start time to indicate the start time should be the current time when getTransformation(long, Transformation) is invoked for the first animation frame. This can is useful for short animations.

field.name: RELATIVE_TO_SELF
field.comment: The specified dimension holds a float and should be multiplied by the height or width of the object being animated.

field.name: ZORDER_BOTTOM
field.comment: Requests that the content being animated be forced under all other content for the duration of the animation.

method.name: Resource
method.comment: Load Animation from Resource

class.name: com.aghajari.rvplugins.Amir_RVAnimationSet
class.comment:
Amir RecyclerView Plugin
Represents a group of Animations that should be played together. The transformation of each individual animation are composed together into a single transform. If AnimationSet sets any properties that its children also set (for example, duration or fillBefore), the values of AnimationSet override the child values.

method.name: RepeatCount
method.comment: Sets how many times the animation should be repeated. If the repeat count is 0, the animation is never repeated. If the repeat count is greater than 0 or INFINITE, the repeat mode will be taken into account. The repeat count is 0 by default.

method.name: StartOffset
method.comment: When this animation should start relative to the start time. This is most useful when composing complex animations using an AnimationSet where some of the animations components start at different times.

method.name: FillBefore
method.comment: If fillBefore is true, this animation will apply its transformation before the start time of the animation. Defaults to true if not set. Note that this applies when using an {@link android.view.animation.AnimationSet AnimationSet} to chain animations. The transformation is not applied before the AnimationSet itself starts.

method.name: StartTime
method.comment: When this animation should start. When the start time is set to START_ON_FIRST_FRAME startTimeMillis: the start time in milliseconds

method.name: DetachWallpape
method.comment: If detachWallpaper is true, and this is a window animation of a window that has a wallpaper background, then the window will be detached from the wallpaper while it runs. That is, the animation will only be applied to the window, and the wallpaper behind it will remain static.

method.name: Duration
method.comment: How long this animation should last. The duration cannot be negative.

method.name: RestrictDuration
method.comment: Ensure that the duration that this animation will run is not longer than <var>durationMillis</var>. In addition to adjusting the duration itself, this ensures that the repeat count also will not make it run longer than the given time.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Constructor to use when building an AnimationSet from code shareInterpolator : Pass true if all of the animations in this set should use the interpolator associated with this AnimationSet. Pass false if each animation should use its own interpolator.

method.name: FillEnabled
method.comment: If fillEnabled is true, the animation will apply the value of fillBefore and fillAfter. Otherwise, fillBefore and fillAfter are ignored and the animation transformation is always applied.

method.name: RepeatMode
method.comment: Defines what this animation should do when it reaches the end. This setting is applied only when the repeat count is either greater than 0 or INFINITE. Defaults to RESTART.

method.name: ZAdjustment
method.comment: Set the Z ordering mode to use while running the animation. zAdjustment: The desired mode, one of ZORDER_NORMAL, ZORDER_TOP, or ZORDER_BOTTOM.

method.name: Interpolator
method.comment: Sets the interpolator used to interpolate the delays between the children.

method.name: FillAfter
method.comment: If fillAfter is true, the transformation that this animation performed will persist when it is finished. Defaults to false if not set. Note that this applies when using an {@link android.view.animation.AnimationSet AnimationSet} to chain animations. The transformation is not applied before the AnimationSet itself starts.

method.name: AddAnimation
method.comment: Add a child animation to this animation set. The transforms of the child animations are applied in the order that they were added

property.name: Animations
property.comment: return All the child animations in this AnimationSet. Note that this may include other AnimationSets, which are not expanded.

field.name: ABSOLUTE
field.comment: The specified dimension is an absolute number of pixels.

field.name: ZORDER_NORMAL
field.comment: Requests that the content being animated be kept in its current Z order.

field.name: RELATIVE_TO_PARENT
field.comment: The specified dimension holds a float and should be multiplied by the height or width of the parent of the object being animated.

field.name: RESTART
field.comment: When the animation reaches the end and the repeat count is INFINTE_REPEAT or a positive value, the animation restarts from the beginning.

field.name: REVERSE
field.comment: When the animation reaches the end and the repeat count is INFINTE_REPEAT or a positive value, the animation plays backward (and then forward again).

field.name: INFINITE
field.comment: Repeat the animation indefinitely.

field.name: ZORDER_TOP
field.comment: Requests that the content being animated be forced on top of all other content for the duration of the animation.

field.name: START_ON_FIRST_FRAME
field.comment: Can be used as the start time to indicate the start time should be the current time when getTransformation(long, Transformation) is invoked for the first animation frame. This can is useful for short animations.

field.name: RELATIVE_TO_SELF
field.comment: The specified dimension holds a float and should be multiplied by the height or width of the object being animated.

field.name: ZORDER_BOTTOM
field.comment: Requests that the content being animated be forced under all other content for the duration of the animation.

class.name: com.aghajari.rvplugins.Amir_RVGridLayoutAnimation
class.comment:
Amir_RecyclerView Plugin
add created Animation to recycler view with grid layout type

method.name: Order
method.comment: Sets the order used to compute the delay of each child's animation.

method.name: DirectionPriority
method.comment: Specifies the direction priority of the animation. For instance, PRIORITY_COLUMN will give priority to columns: the animation will first play on the column, then on the rows.Z

method.name: ScheduleLayoutAnimation
method.comment: Schedules the layout animation to be played after the next layout pass of this view group. This can be used to restart the layout animation when the content of the view group changes or when the activity is paused and resumed.

method.name: ColumnDelay
method.comment: Sets the delay, as a fraction of the animation duration, by which the children's animations are offset from one column to the other.

method.name: Direction
method.comment: Sets the direction of the animation. The direction is expressed as an integer containing a horizontal and vertical component.

method.name: Delay
method.comment: Sets the delay, as a fraction of the animation duration, by which the children's animations are offset. The general formula is:

method.name: RequestLayout
method.comment: Request Layout

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize and load animation from resource

method.name: Build
method.comment: Set layout animation to RecyclerView

method.name: NotifiData
method.comment: Notifi Data Adapter

method.name: Interpolator
method.comment: Sets the interpolator used to interpolate the delays between the children.

method.name: RowDelay
method.comment: Sets the delay, as a fraction of the animation duration, by which the children's animations are offset from one row to the other.

field.name: DIRECTION_VERTICAL_MASK
field.comment: Bitmask used to retrieve the vertical component of the direction.

field.name: DIRECTION_BOTTOM_TO_TOP
field.comment: Animates the children starting from the bottom of the grid to the top.

field.name: PRIORITY_NONE
field.comment: Rows and columns are animated at the same time.

field.name: ORDER_REVERSE
field.comment: Distributes the animation delays in the reverse order in which view were added to their view group.

field.name: DIRECTION_RIGHT_TO_LEFT
field.comment: Animates the children starting from the right of the grid to the left.

field.name: ORDER_NORMAL
field.comment: Distributes the animation delays in the order in which view were added to their view group.

field.name: ORDER_RANDOM
field.comment: Randomly distributes the animation delays.

field.name: DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL_MASK
field.comment: Bitmask used to retrieve the horizontal component of the direction.

field.name: PRIORITY_COLUMN
field.comment: Columns are animated first.

field.name: PRIORITY_ROW
field.comment: Rows are animated first.

field.name: DIRECTION_LEFT_TO_RIGHT
field.comment: Animates the children starting from the left of the grid to the right.

field.name: DIRECTION_TOP_TO_BOTTOM
field.comment: Animates the children starting from the top of the grid to the bottom.

class.name: com.aghajari.rvplugins.Amir_RVLinearLayoutAnimation
class.comment:
Amir_RecyclerView Plugin
add created Animation to recycler view with linear layout type

method.name: Order
method.comment: Sets the order used to compute the delay of each child's animation.

method.name: RequestLayout
method.comment: Request Layout

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize and load animation from resource

method.name: ScheduleLayoutAnimation
method.comment: Schedules the layout animation to be played after the next layout pass of this view group. This can be used to restart the layout animation when the content of the view group changes or when the activity is paused and resumed.

method.name: Build
method.comment: Set layout animation to RecyclerView

method.name: NotifiData
method.comment: Notifi Data Adapter

method.name: Interpolator
method.comment: Sets the interpolator used to interpolate the delays between the children.

method.name: Delay
method.comment: Sets the delay, as a fraction of the animation duration, by which the children's animations are offset. The general formula is:

field.name: ORDER_REVERSE
field.comment: Distributes the animation delays in the reverse order in which view were added to their view group.

field.name: ORDER_NORMAL
field.comment: Distributes the animation delays in the order in which view were added to their view group.

field.name: ORDER_RANDOM
field.comment: Randomly distributes the animation delays.
